item.title: Automatically Update Antigen
item.author: jordan@jwillikers.com (Jordan Williams)
item.description: There’s a catch when it comes to managing plugins with Antigen as done in Configure ZSH. According to the Antigen documentation: This is something you might not want to put in your .zshrc. Instead, run it occasionally to update your plugins. — Antigen Wiki: Commands - antigen update I hate having to do any form of maintenance occasionally, especially simple maintenance. This has two potential outcomes: Completely forget to do it ever.
